monturas.name: Porxie King
monturas.description: Summon forth your porxie king. Smells like bacon that's a cut above the rest─though that might just be an effect of the crown.
monturas.enhanced_description: Unlike its kin, this porxie was born without the ability to cure the tempered. Rather than have it go to waste, however, it was made into a mount and given a crown─perhaps to evoke a sense of luxury and comfort.
monturas.tooltip: This specimen can be considered royalty among them.    - Martineau

monturas.name: Wivre
monturas.description: Summon forth your wivre, a mighty horned beast said to be nature's battering ram.
monturas.enhanced_description: Native to the New World, these ill-mannered scalekin are notoriously difficult to tame. Yet where others have failed, the Mamool Ja have succeeded, their people employing wivres as beasts of burden and weapons of war both.
monturas.tooltip: I pray that you at least consider a watchful trot into danger rather than a headlong charge...    - Iliud

monturas.name: Papa Paissa
monturas.description: Summon forth Papa Paissa. It's for a good cause.
monturas.enhanced_description: This exceptionally large paissa has sired no less than eight offspring, and in order to earn the coin to rear them, it chose to work as an adventurer's mount. By taking it into your service, you are supporting its adorable brood.
monturas.tooltip: I can only imagine the burden they bear with so many mouths to feed.    - Pip

monturas.name: Level Checker
monturas.description: Summon forth your level checker, a mysterious machine that can determine your strength...and apparently also shrink and carry you inside it.
monturas.enhanced_description: When this mysterious machine first determined your strength, the result was “level 90.” By what method it came up with its figure, and whether it is even accurate, none can possibly say.
monturas.tooltip: You've really taken it to another level with this!    - Kai-Shirr

monturas.name: Victor
monturas.description: Summon forth Victor, a dog to rule over all dogs─at dog shows, that is.
monturas.enhanced_description: Lauded by no less a personage than Emperor Varis, Victor is a perennial champion at Garlean dog shows. Being bred and trained for competition, it isn't suited to combat, though it may at least intimidate foes with its fearsome mien.
monturas.tooltip: Hmph, all bark an' no bite!    - Rabid Wives Houndkeep
